command_constants.internal_error: There has been an internal server error. Please report this to the bot developer.
command_constants.invalidsetup: Oops! It would appear that the discord Owner has not linked his Minecraft server. This command cannot be used.

setup.invalidrange: The inserted ip range isn't valid.
setup.invalidport: The inserted port can't be validated.
setup.invalidownership: I wasn't able to validated your ownership of the server. Please ensure that you put the discord server id in your config.yml.
setup.alreadylinked: Your server is already linked in our system.
setup.linked: Your discord server is now linked to your minecraft server. You may proceed with the setup.
setup.invalidtoken: The inserted token does not meet criteria. Please check the documentation and try again.

verify.invalidcode: The inserted code is not pending verification.
verify.linked: Your discord account is now linked to your Minecraft account.
